actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations to the United States Railway Association for purposes of purchasing securities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations to the United States Railway Association in order to purchase securities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations to the United States Railway Association for purposes of purchasing securities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation.
